main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Brooktondale, New York, on November 7, 1957. The object was described as a bright white object the size of a basketball at arm's length, hovering in the sky for 2 hours and 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed for a significant duration of 2 hours and 10 minutes.
The description of the object matched the size of a basketball at arm's length, although it seemed much larger.
The nature of the object was uncertain, with possibilities including it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object.
The report involved a civilian observation by a trained supervisor, providing credibility to the sighting.
The sighting took place during clear weather conditions with slight haze, and there was no physical evidence of the object.
result: prosaic explanation (material; possibly a balloon, possibly an aircraft, possibly astronomical)
sighted object: bright white object the size of a basketball at arm's length
